com.threerings.gwt.ui
Class FluentTable.Cell

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.gwt.ui.FluentTable.Cell
Enclosing class:
FluentTable
public static class FluentTable.Cell
extends java.lang.Object

Used to format cells. Returned by all methods that configure cells.

          The column we're formatting.

Sets the colspan of the cell we're formatting.

setStyles

public FluentTable.Cell setStyles(java.lang.String... styles)
Configures the specified style names on our cell. The first style is set as the primary style and additional styles are added onto that.

right

public FluentTable.Cell right()
Returns the cell to the right of this cell, (row, column+1).

down

public FluentTable.Cell down()
Returns the cell below this cell, (row+1, column).

add

public FluentTable.Cell add()
Returns the cell below this cell at column 0, (row+1, 0).

table

public FluentTable table()
Returns the table associated with this cell. Useful for chaining the construction and configuration of a table into a single expression: new FluentTable().add().setText("Foo").right().setText("Bar").table()
